plot: Yan, a Chinese immigrant from Hong Kong, has made Canada his home for ten years, leaving behind his parents and a promise.
title: When Swallows Stop Singing
plot_es: Yan, a Chinese immigrant from Hong Kong, has made Canada his home for ten years, leaving behind his parents and a promise.
plot_en: Yan, a Chinese immigrant from Hong Kong, has made Canada his home for ten years, leaving behind his parents and a promise.
